DataElement.preferredName: Patient Diagnosis Eligibility Determination Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no/unknown/not applicable indicator related to a patient has recognition of the presence and nature of disease to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to a person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease. Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, Unknown, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 requested By Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership  transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/23/16 jk value "Not evaluable" added in error by COG on 3/21/16 was removed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is patient diagnosed with any
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient diagnosed with any of the following?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient newly diagnosed and eligible as confirmed by rapid central pathology and molecular screening review on APEC14B1?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have fulminant PTLD?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have any documented donor-derived PTLD?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient newly diagnosed with B-LLy Murphy Stages I or II?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient newly diagnosed with B-LLy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient newly diagnosed with B-LLy Murphy Stages III or IV?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient newly diagnosed non-pontine H3 K27M-mutant HGG without BRAF or IDH1 mutations as confirmed by Rapid Central Pathology and Molecular Screening Reviews performed on APEC14B1?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient newly diagnosed with non-pontine H3 K27M-mutant HGG without BRAF or IDH1 mutations as confirmed by Rapid Central Pathology and Molecular Screening Reviews performed on APEC14B1?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have newly diagnosed B-ALL with definitive evidence of ABL-class fusion?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient been newly diagnosed and declared eligible by rapid central pathology and molecular screening review?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 01
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient been newly diagnosed with non-pontine H3 K27M-mutant HGG (without BRAF or IDH1 mutations) as confirmed by Rapid Central Pathology and Molecular Screening Reviews performed on APEC14B1?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 001
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient been newly diagnosed with non-pontine H3 K27M-wild type HGG (without BRAF or IDH1 mutations) as confirmed by Rapid Central Pathology and Molecular Screening Reviews performed on APEC14B1?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 15
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient been newly diagnosed with non-pontine H3 K27M-mutant HGG (without BRAF or IDH1 mutations) as confirmed by Rapid Central Pathology and Molecular Screening Reviews performed on APEC14B1 or through the CCDI Molecular Characterization Initiative?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 17
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient been diagnosed with ALL, AML, or MDS for which an allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplant is indicated?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 16
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient been newly diagnosed with non-pontine H3 K27M-wild type HGG (without BRAF or IDH1 mutations) as confirmed by Rapid Central Pathology and Molecular Screening Reviews performed on APEC14B1 or through the CCDI Molecular Characterization Initiative?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 13
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient been newly diagnosed with non-pontine H3 K27M-mutant HGG (without BRAF or IDH1 mutations) as confirmed by Rapid Central Pathology and Molecular Screening Reviews performed on APEC14B1 or through the CCDI Molecular Characterization Initiative (CCDI-MCI)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 14
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient been newly diagnosed with non-pontine H3 K27M-wild type HGG (without BRAF or IDH1 mutations) as confirmed by Rapid Central Pathology and Molecular Screening Reviews performed on APEC14B1 or through the CCDI Molecular Characterization Initiative (CCDI-MCI)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 12
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient been diagnosed with AML, B-ALL, T-ALL, or mixed phenotype acute leukemia (MPAL)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have Newly Diagnosed B-ALL, T-ALL, Lymphoblastic Lymphoma, or Mixed-Phenotype Acute Leukemia/Lymphoma?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 18
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have newly diagnosed B-ALL with evidence of ABL-class fusion?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 19
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have newly diagnosed B-ALL with evidence of ABL-class fusion documented by a clinically-validated assay within 15 days of the first dose of vincristine during Induction therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 20
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient CMV sero-positive (i.e., recipient CMV immunoglobulin G positive)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 21
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient been diagnosed with ALL, AML,  MDS or MPAL for which an allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplant is indicated?

DataElement.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
